translations: n.[园艺]豇豆（cowpea 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Cowpeas are an important crop in many African countries.
sentences.translation: 黑眼豆是很多非洲国家的重要作物。

sentences.sentence: There, the staples are millet, cowpeas, and a drought-resistant variety of sorghum known as guinea corn.
sentences.translation: 在那里，主食是小米，豇豆以及一种称为苞米的抗旱高粱品种。

sentences.sentence: So if you put your cowpeas in there, they will be destroyed because the insects will still access the air.
sentences.translation: 因此如果你把豇豆装入这种袋中，它们很快就会毁掉，因为害虫仍能接触到空气。
